retrofit

Interface CallAdapter<T>


  • public interface CallAdapter<T>
    Adapts a Call into the type of T.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  CallAdapter.Factory 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <R> T adapt(Call<R> call)
      Returns an instance of the T which adapts the execution of call.
      Type responseType()
      Returns the value type that this adapter uses when converting the HTTP response body to a Java object.

    • Method Detail

      • responseType

        Type responseType()
        Returns the value type that this adapter uses when converting the HTTP response body to a Java object. For example, the response type for Call<Repo> is Repo. This type is used to prepare the call passed to #adapt.

        Note that this is typically not the same type as the returnType provided to this call adapter's factory.

      • adapt

        <R> T adapt(Call<R> call)
        Returns an instance of the T which adapts the execution of call.
